title: Himi 580
lyrics:
M.Kh.
1.
‘Oi, te te fiu ‘afē ‘i hono lau
Ki he ‘ofa e ‘a Sīsū kia au?
‘Ene tuku pē ‘a Langi,
‘O ne hifo ki māmani,
‘Oi, te te fiu ‘afē ‘i hono lau?
Hulā mo Ia ke fua ‘eku hia;
Ke veteange au.
Mo tauhi tauhi ma’u;
Hulā mo Ia ke hifo ‘o pekia;
Ke u ‘alu ki he langi, ‘o nofo ma’u mo la.
2.
Si’i foli e ‘a Sīsū he fonua,
Ko e fai ‘a e finangalo he ‘Otua!
‘Ene ‘ai ke ‘ā ‘a e kui,
Mo e mate ke mo’ui,
‘O ne tala vete ha’i he popula!
Hulā mo Ia, etc.
3.
‘Oi, hono tukifa’o he ‘Akau
Ko e hulu ‘ene ‘ofa kia au!
Mo e toto ne tafea
‘Ene tofu he lavea,
Ke totongi ‘a e mo’ua pe a’aku.
Hulā mo la, etc.
4.
Talu ai mo ‘eku nofo pē ‘o lau,
“Sīsū ē, ko si’o hopoate au.
Kuo tō he ‘Afiona
‘A e mo’ui ni kotoa,
Pea u toki fakamālō he Kahaʻu.”
Hulā mo la ke fua ‘eku hia;
Ke veteange au.
Mo tauhi tauhi maʻu;
Hulā mo la ke hifo ‘o pekia;
Ke u ‘alu ki he langi, ‘o nofo ma’u mo Ia.*
